nodes.text: Switchmount was a location where the 61st Mobile Infantry operated by the time the company served the New Republic. During its time there, the company attempted to intervene when civilians began killing each other, making the situation worse as a result. Around 5 ABY, the 61st was deployed on the planet Troithe, where a portion of the company eventually took refuge at a three story speeder garage in the Highgarden District. When one New Republic soldier on watch suggested intervening in a distant riot, Sergeant Carver cited their time at Switchmount as to why he thought the former's idea would not work.
Switchmount was mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
